name: Cheesy Mini Pepper Poppers with Sprouted Rice
author: truRoots(R)
summary: Sweet mini pepper halves are filled with a savory blend of sprouted rice, Italian sausage, marinara sauce, and shredded cheese for pretty and delicious appetizer bites.
ingredients: ⅓ cup truRoots® Accents™ Organic Sprouted Rice Trio
2 (8 ounce) packages mini sweet peppers (2- to 3-inches long)
½ pound hot Italian pork sausage, casing removed
1 ½ cups shredded Italian cheese blend
directions: Line 11 x 17-inch baking pan with parchment paper
Bring water to boil in medium saucepan over high heat
Cover and cook 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed
Cut each pepper in half, from stem to tip
Brown sausage in large skillet over medium-high heat
Stir in rice, marinara sauce, Italian Seasoning and salt
Stir in 1/2 cup cheese and basil
Fill each pepper with sausage mixture
Bake 10 minutes or until heated through and peppers are still crisp
Bake until cheese is melted, about 3 minutes
